mapper.select: select count(store_code) from t_sys_store where is_delete = 0 and invite_code = #{inviteCode}
mapper.update: update t_sys_customer set invite_code = #{inviteCode}, user_image_path = #{userProfile}, version = version + 1, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser}, last_update_time = now() where user_code = #{userCode} and version = #{version}
